The baby Prince Nicholas lived with his wet nurse and nurse Sdvishna in the late prin- cess 1 rooms and Princess Mary spent most of the day in the nursery, taking a mother's place to her little nephew as best she could. Made- moiselle Bourienne, too, seemed passionately fond of the boy, and Princess Mary often de- prived herself to give her friend the pleasure of dandling the little angel as she called her nephew and playing with him.
